definition: three-stroke form of Kangxi radical 94 犬[quan3]
outstanding/particularly, especially/a fault/to express discontentment against
to remain fresh in one's memory (idiom)
to wish to continue sth/to have not fully expressed oneself
words still ringing in one's ears (idiom)
too far is as bad as not enough (idiom, from the Analects)

sentences.english: And Jehoshaphat the king of Judah returned to his house in peace to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 犹大王约沙法平平安安地回耶路撒冷，到宫里去了。

sentences.english: As for the Czar government, the transformation of Counter-Jew policy had its profound reason.
sentences.chinese: 沙皇政府对犹政策的转变有其深刻的原因。

sentences.english: The woman is thirty years old, this is the most attractive rose, the age of maturity and charming.
sentences.chinese: 女忍叁拾岁湜玫瑰，哲湜最犹魅力得年龄，成熟迷忍。

sentences.english: He was also the last good king of Judah.
sentences.chinese: 他也是犹大国最后的一位好王。

sentences.english: The elder unto the wellbeloved Gaius, whom I love in the truth.
sentences.chinese: 作长老的写信给亲爱的该犹，就是我诚心所爱的。

sentences.english: And the time that David was king in Hebron over the house of Judah was seven years and six months.
sentences.chinese: 大卫在希伯仑作犹大家的王，共七年零六个月。

sentences.english: In the twentieth year of Jeroboam king of Israel, Asa began to reign over Judah.
sentences.chinese: 以色列王耶罗波安二十年，亚撒登基作犹大王。

sentences.english: They generally live near water and are excellent swimmers.
sentences.chinese: 它们通常生活在水域附近，犹擅游泳。

sentences.english: A thousand friends are few one enemy is too many.
sentences.chinese: 同伴千人尚觉少，仇人一人犹嫌多。

sentences.english: The pleasure of quietness out of helpless dreamy night.
sentences.chinese: 梦想成空的夜晚犹有静谧的欢乐。

sentences.english: There were others Bo people live in north and northwest of Bozhou at Shong Dyn…
sentences.chinese: 此外，播州正北及西北宋代犹有其他人支系活动。

sentences.english: Rehoboam son of Solomon was king in Judah.
sentences.chinese: 所罗门的儿子罗波安作犹大王。

sentences.english: There were others Bo people live in north and northwest of Bozhou at Shong Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 此外，播州正北及西北宋代犹有其他人支系活动。

sentences.english: The roses in her hand, the flavor in mine.
sentences.chinese: 赠人玫瑰之手，经久犹有余香。

sentences.english: In the eighteenth year of King Jeroboam, Abijah began to reign over Judah.
sentences.chinese: 耶罗波安王十八年，亚比雅登基作犹大王。

sentences.english: She had no pulse, but death seemed absent still.
sentences.chinese: 死神似犹尚未降临，可她却摸不出脉象。

definition: different/unique/special/very/(classical) to behead/to die/to cut off/to separate/to surpass
lit. the mountains crumble and the trees lie ruined/a great sage has died (idiom)
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
